reviewText:
If you like the "Cantinflas" movies and you're over 45 -and have sentimental connections with Mexico- you might like this movie. But your children probably will not! This movie is simply too old-fashioned in every aspect.
The only good scene is when they sing Cri-Cri's "Marcha de las letras" and all the cows move their tails to the rhythm.
I bought it for my 3 y.o son and, like me, he didn't care for the movie at all.
